text:
Think there is a change of staff / management.
The service standards to clients (your loyal clinics over many years.... probably longer than the tenure of your new team!!) have dropped tremendously!

We have been with Pan-Malayan Pharmaceuticals for 2 decades... recently, a customer service supervisor, a Suzanne xxx, unilaterally told us it would severe our business relationship just because of some inconvenience of debt collection.
Very rude. Very shocking. Wondering if this is the high-handedness from the highest level (the owners; shareholders)??
Can you please explain the huge price difference between what you charge for the Dotory Plus FS-100 thermometer and what most online vendors charge?
